thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Watertek Information Technology Sees 2017 Net Profit From Down 10 Percent To Up 20 Percent

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Watertek Information Technology Sees 2017 Net Profit From Down 10 Percent To Up 20 Percent

organizations.name: beijing watertek information technology co ltd

text:
Jan 12 (Reuters) - Beijing Watertek Information Technology Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT SEES 2017 NET PROFIT FROM DOWN 10 PERCENT TO UP 20 PERCENT VERSUS 377.3 MILLION YUAN ($58.41 million) A YEAR AGO Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2mn8CSt Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.4591 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
